thread.section_title: Oz Lotteries Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oz Lotteries | www.ozlotteries.com
thread.title: Sam

author: Sam
title: Sam
text: i recently opened an account with ozlotteries only to find out that if your outside australia they will even charge more (almost double the amount then if you sign in as inside australia) this is kinda discriminating i mean what's the difference it's not like they're puting extra charge if a foreigner buy from them the ticket price is double yes double and i feel really really like a 2nd degree human about this that some people pay x amount from their site and me from the same site same service same everything i have to pay double! am ready to give out my details if ozlotteries wants to check my account no prob with that but still why?
